text: Joseph Djida (8 April 1945 - 6 January 2015) was a Cameroonian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest on 5 December 1976. He was appointed the second bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Ngaoundéré on 23 October 2000. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cameroonian Roman Catholic priests Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Djida
